channel.title: Henderiks J on Earth System Evolution
channel.description: Recent content in Henderiks J on Earth System Evolution

item.title: Long‐term evolutionary and ecological responses of calcifying phytoplankton to changes in atmospheric CO2
item.description: We show that coccolithophores were globally more common and widespread, larger, and more heavily calcified in the pre‐34 Ma greenhouse world, and declined along with pCO$<sub>2</sub> during the Oligocene (34–23 Ma). Our results suggest that atmospheric pCO<sub>2</sub> has exerted an important long‐term control on coccolithophores.
